Text:
Hi Karaoke, 

Thanks for uploading the nice books!

Would you be able to find books by Kay Hooper?

(http://www.amazon.com/Stealing-Shadows-Trilogy-Kay-Hooper/dp/0553575538/ref=wl_it_dp_o_pC?ie=UTF8&coliid=I1DJQ2S1MKAOE&colid=3K0ONAALVDZES)

I've had no luck so far (frankly, I don't know where to look!).  Thanks.
thank you Karaoke. I greatly appreciate all your posts!

Lao_2012
sorry,had no luck finding this book myself

Thank you, karaokeking, for these awesome books! Debbie Macomber is one of my favourite chick lit authors. I am looking for books by Candace Bushnell. I just finished reading One Fifth Avenue and if you can find any more books by this author I would greatly appreciate it.

Hi there!
Thank you for ALL your posts (I am still going through them :X) I've recently acquired my first Kindle and I love reading on it. I've found your post very helpful. SO many books so little time :))

I was wondering if I could make a request. I am looking for this book: http://www.amazon.com/The-God-Factory-ebook/dp/B005I6IXPU/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1332439822&sr=8-1 And anything by Michael Faust. I've tried looking for them myself but I've had no luck.

Thanks in advance!
Have a great day/ night ( wherever you are)

Kassandra1408
sorry,but i can`t find any links for these books at all on the net
I really appreciate your trying to find them! Thanks! You totally rock!
